title: FBS_ESPE (Enum)
text:
TYPE FBS_ESPE :
Definition of SF_ESPE function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: INIT
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. The function block was enabled. Check if
S_StartReset is required.

rows.Name: OUT_ENABLED
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. S_ESPE_In = TRUE. Functional mode with
S_ESPE_Out = TRUE.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_IN_1
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. Check if Reset is FALSE and wait for
S_ESPE_In = TRUE.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_RESET_1
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. S_ESPE_In = TRUE. Wait for rising
trigger of Reset.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_IN_2
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. Safety demand detected. Check if Reset
is FALSE and wait for S_ESPE_In = TRUE.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_RESET_2
rows.Comment:
Activation is TRUE. S_ESPE_In = TRUE. Check for S_AutoReset
or wait for rising trigger of Reset.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Reset is TRUE while waiting for S_ESPE_In = TRUE.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_2
rows.Comment: Reset is TRUE while waiting for S_ESPE_In = TRUE.
